Text.Page:
The Mysterium has engaged hundreds of civilians to combat the corruption in the region. Still, there aren't enough soldiers to protect them all. Your prowess suggests you may be able to battle the {@LinkCreature:28#3021#reeking orisks} without incurring unacceptable casualties.

Eliminating them will allow Mysterium operatives to focus on cleansing the contamination.
An acceptable display of skill, <PCNAME>. Your sacrifice means that my operatives can proceed with the real work in this region.
